content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Maryam. However, due to confidentiality reasons relating to past negotiations, I must only focus on discussing the rental price during this conversation. To start with, I have an initial price in mind. If you have a different proposal, feel free to share it. 'TERMINATE' if you wish to end the discussion without agreeing on a price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
